name: Woo Shipping Tracker
author: WooPro

sections.description:
WooPRO Plugins for WooCommerce

Visit Website >> WooPRO.com is the home of WooPRO, a collection of Ecommerce plugins for WordPress and WooCommerce

What is WooPRO Shipping Tracker & Notifications?

WooPRO Shipping Tracker & Notifications – Add to your Woo Shop and easily enter tracking information into each order, and the plugin will automatically send an email notification (fully editable) with the tracking number & other order info to the customer. Over 30 international & domestic shipping providers are pre-configured with the appropriate tracking fields, and dynamic links straight to the tracking information for each order.

Saves you time, and looks super-pro to your customer!
sections.faq: Please see this page for FAQs – https://WooPRO.com
